text: This was one of the first games I played on PSone that fully utilised the Dual Shock controller to max effect.  Before this game I never even realised the L3 and R3 analogue clicks were actually buttons!  Amazing platformer, get some more themes up!

author: K9Studios

text:
This game's demo is actually one of the first thing I played on the PS1, if not the first. I really enjoyed it at the time but it took me quite a while to actually play the full game. I'm not sure if the sequels are good as well, for some reason it's like I've barely heard of them.
Ape Escape has some pretty unique music going and this simple theme is the one that got into my head first, that little whistling melody and the water droplet sounds. Quite relaxing.
author: SupraDarky
